text: ai eemaanadaaron jab tum namaaz ke liye aamaada ho to apane munh aur kohaniyon tak haath dho liya karo aur apane saron ka aur takhanon tak povon ka masaah kar liya karo aur agar tum haalate janaabat mein ho to tum tahaarat (gusl) kar lo (ho) aur agar tum beemaar ho ya safar mein ho ya tumamen se kisee ko paikhaana nikal aae ya auraton se hamabistaree kee ho aur tumako paanee na mil sake to paak khaak se taimoom kar lo yaani (donon haath maarakar) usase apane munh aur apane haathon ka masa kar lo (dekho to khuda ne kaisee aasaanee kar dee) khuda to ye chaahata hee nahin ki tum par kisee tarah kee tangee kare balki vo ye chaahata hai ki paak va paakeeza kar de aur tumapar apanee neamate pooree kar de taaki tum shukraguzaar ban jao
